txt.en: A tomb of the Men of Gondor from the Second Age has been revealed in a secluded area of the Norcrofts. It is unknown what treasures -- or dangers -- may lie within.\n\nThe greatest discoveries are often hidden at the bottom of such ancient tombs, waiting for some adventurers to come and seek them out.
A tomb of the Men of Gondor from the Second Age has been discovered in a secluded area of the Norcrofts. It is unknown what treasures -- or dangers -- may lie within.
You have explored the depths of the ancient tomb
The ancient tomb lies to the south of Elthengels, hidden in a remote corner of the Norcrofts by a waterfall.\n\nThe ancient tomb awaits your exploration.
Explore the depths of the ancient tomb
The ancient tomb lies to the south of Elthengels, hidden in a remote corner of the Norcrofts by a waterfall.\n\nThe ancient tomb awaits your exploration.
